column4: Hey all, let's say that I  want to install a PPA version of something to get security patches as they come out but that I want to revert to the non PPA version, is there a site that would explain how I can do that?
I mean I want to revert when the non-PPA is patched..
dagni,  s3r3n1t7  thanks.. but how do I know when a security patch for the non-PPA is out if I am using the PPA version ? Won't I only get notices for the PPA version?
assuming you didn't pin any official packages, simply remove the apps from the ppa normally, then remove the ppa from your sources, then install the official packages.
